Question: In June, this person played banjo along with the Steep Canyon Rangers on A Prairie Home Companion, and began a two-month U.S.
Hints: In 1999, this person and Hawn starred in a remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy, The Out-of-Towners.
While on the show this person became close with several of the cast members, including Gilda Radner.
This person first picked up the banjo when he was around 17 years of age.
